name: BattleCrypt Bombers (itch)
description:
Unleash explosive chaos in BattleCrypt Bombers - an arena combat game for all ages! Up to four players control tiny skeletons in a dangerous world of explosive combat.

Collect and lob bombs at other players in fast-paced, competitive arena play. But be careful, bombs set off chain reactions that are dangerous to all players! Master dungeons such as Crypt O Currency, Throttle Grotto and The Maulcano. Over seven unique levels reward skilled play while being simple to learn for younger players.

BattleCrypt Bombers has no bad language or blood and minimal reading. Combat is cartoony, stylized and should be suitable for most ages.

BattleCrypt Bombers Requires:

  • PC computer
  • Graphics card capable of running OGL 3+ (almost any modern dedicated card)
  • Up to four Xbox controllers

Note: you can play this game with a keyboard but it is not the recommended experience!
